Blacknitmare/Perceptor::

Blacknightmare was ready to answer Kitkat when she left the base, the 
reaven followed her and saw Perceptor, the second in rank, with his 
precence here she was free of her duties and she continued following 
Kitkat2. She almost reached her

"Wait me, wait me!!!" said the reaven while she flew few feet over 
her 
--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat2::
> She got up and opened her link,"DarkMouse, I'm going for a brief 
> walk. I'll return in a few nano clicks."  She closed her link and 
> transformed into wolf mode.  She started out in a dead run. It felt 
> great to run and feel the wind in her fur again.  She loved the 
feel 
> of running, it was almost like flying, but with all four feet on 
the 
> ground.  She dove, ducked, weaved in and out of the trees.  She 
felt 
> like a pup again. 
> 
> ::KitKat3::
> She was in wolf mode and running at high speed. She just had to go 
> and see her pack. It was more than an order from Zardus, it was 
pure 
> instinct to be with the pack that drove her.  She ran at full tilt, 
> pushing herself ever faster.  She was closing the distance.  She 
was 
> just coming up upon a creek with large boulders and heavy flowing 
> water, when, WHAM!
